adventureCategories.name: Sundarbans Expedition
adventureCategories.description: Discover the unique flora and fauna of the Sundarbans while navigating its intricate waterways.

adventureCategories.name: Bandarban Trek
adventureCategories.description: Embark on a scenic trek through the hills and tribal villages of Bandarban.

adventureCategories.name: Ratargul Swamp Forest Kayaking
adventureCategories.description: Paddle through the mysterious Ratargul Swamp, the only freshwater swamp forest in Bangladesh.

adventureCategories.name: Srimangal Tea Garden Cycling
adventureCategories.description: Cycle through the lush tea gardens of Srimangal and savor the aroma of freshly brewed tea.

adventureCategories.name: Naf River Scuba Diving
adventureCategories.description: Dive into the clear waters of the Naf River for an unforgettable scuba diving experience.
